data.title: Destiny 2: Nightfall this Week
data.meta_description: Get this week's Nightfall details, # champions and shields, Nightfall schedule, and more.
data.text:
WEEK 11: AUG 13 ‚Äì 20, 2024

Strike: Liminality

Activity Power Cap

More: Various modifiers based on difficulty

NOTE: We are still looking to gather the number of shields/champs in Expert and Master/Grandmaster difficulties, if you are able to confirm this send a us a message (you may also contact us on Discord, Twitter, or Instagram). Credit will be given.

MORE DETAILS:

Loot Pool Changes

The following weapons are leaving the Nightfall weapon rotation starting at the launch of The Final Shape on June 4, 2024. Normal variants will be obtainable through focusing with Zavala, Adept variants will only be available if featured.

Source: TWID (February 11, 2024)

NOTE: Bungie will provide details on weapons taking their place in a future TWID.

Nightfall Info

When does the weekly Nightfall change?

Currently it changes at 9 AM PST on the Weekly Reset (Tuesday).

Matchmaking

Enabled on Adept and Hero difficulties.

Disabled on Legend, Master, or Grandmaster difficulties.

Weekly Challenges

Complete 5, higher difficulties grant the most efficient progress. (Powerful Gear/T1)

Complete with a team score of 100k or more. (Pinnacle Gear)

Power Level and Reward Chance

Power Level

Hero (1770)

Legend (1830)

Master (1840)

GM (1840)

Nightfall Weapon

Uncommon

Ascendant Shards

Common

Uncommon

Common

GM Nightfalls

Combatants take and deal more damage, and are more aggressive.

Champions appear more, revives are limited, and Darkness encroaching will require revives within a certain time period.

One Nightfall weapon has a chance to drop with random rolls every week from Nightfall completions. Adept Nightfall Weapons only have a chance to drop from Grandmaster difficulty.

Grandmaster difficulty has a chance to drop Adept Nightfall weapons, Adept mods, Ascendant Shards, and Enhancement Prisms upon completion.

Nightfalls Schedule

üéñÔ∏è GRANDMASTER NIGHTFALLS ARE AVAILABLE

Adept variants of Nightfall weapons have a chance to drop from Grandmaster Nightfalls.

Nightfall Schedule

News & Updates

Updates/Changes

NO RECENT CHANGES

Effective: Lightfall/Season 20

REWARD CHANGES

HERO

Old

Small chance of up to two Enhancement Prisms.

One Enhancement Core and a small chance of up to two more.

New

One Enhancement Prism and a medium chance at one more.

Two Enhancement Cores and a medium chance of one more.

LEGEND

Old

One Enhancement Prism and a small chance at up to two more.

New

Small chance of one Ascendant Shard.

Two Enhancement Prisms and a medium chance of up to two more.

MASTER

Old

Medium chance of one Ascendant Shard.

Two Prisms and small chance of up to two more.

New

One Ascendant Shard and a small chance of one more.

Two Enhancement Prisms and a medium chance of up to two more.

GRANDMASTER

Old

One Ascendant Shard and a medium chance of one more.

Four Enhancement Prisms and a medium chance of up to two more.

New

One Ascendant Shard and a high chance of one more.

Four Enhancement Prisms and a medium chance of up to two more.

ACTIVITY CHANGES

Mars Heist Battleground added to Nightfall rotation.

More to come in future seasons.

Two Surges available.

Threats dependent on the featured Nightfall.

One featured Overcharged weapon.

Combatants are harder to stagger and have more health.

Nightfall activity levels for Season 20:

Hero: 1770

Legend: 1830

Master: 1840

Grandmaster: 1840

Power delta disadvantages:

Hero: -5 Power levels

Legend: -15 Power levels

Master: -20 Power levels

Grandmaster: -25 Power levels

Maximum effectiveness targets:

Hero: 1765

Legend: 1815

Master: 1820

Grandmaster: 1815

Nightfall weekly challenge now requires you to attain 200,000 points across multiple Nightfall runs, instead of than 100,000 points in a single run.

Source: Bungie

Grandmaster Details

Your Power level caps 25 levels below the activity level. For Season 20, that means combatants will be 1840, but you will be 1815 at the most.

Combatants can take more hits, deal more damage and are quite aggressive.

Champions will be abundant, so be sure to have the proper weapons to deal with them.

There‚Äôs one Burn, that will cause you to receive 25% more damage from a certain element.

Also, two elemental Surges and Overcharged weapons, both granting a 25% damage increase.

Revives are limited. And after a certain amount of time, Darkness will encroach and you won‚Äôt be able to revive or be revived.

Source: TWAB (Apr 6, 2023)

Grandmaster Changes

The following changes have been made.

Decreased the Power level needed to enter Grandmasters by 25 to 1580 (the powerful cap).

Decreased the overall Power level of Grandmaster activities by 10 to 1620.

The current Power difference of -25 (all enemies are at least 25 Power above you) is still in effect.

‚ÄúThis means you can enter at 1580, but enemies will be 40 Power above you. You can use Artifact Power and/or pinnacle drops to increase effectiveness up to 1595, where you reach maximum effectiveness.‚Äù

Source: TWAB (Jan 12, 2023)

Past Nightfalls

Season 22 // Season of the Witch

Season 21 // Season of the Deep

Season 20 // Season of Defiance

Weapon Rotation Update

The following weapons are leaving the Nightfall weapon rotation starting at the launch of The Final Shape on June 4, 2024. Normal variants will be obtainable through focusing with Zavala, Adept variants will only be available if featured.

Braytech Osprey (Rocket Launcher)

Last week: April 9 ‚Äì 16

Loaded Question (Fusion Rifle)

Last week: April 23 ‚Äì 30

Source: TWID (February 11, 2024)

Loot Pool Update

Reminder: All new and reprised weapons from Prophecy dungeon and Guardian Games All-Stars, as well as new weapons to the rotation for Iron Banner, Trials of Osiris, and Nightfall will all be retroactively enhanceable when The Final Shape launches on June 4. Source: Bungie
